name: Thinknum Alternative Data API
description: Web scraping intelligence platform providing alternative data insights through comprehensive tracking of company metrics, consumer behavior, and market trends via automated data collection from public web sources.

access_info.pricing_model: Enterprise-only with custom pricing - contact sales for access

endpoints.description: Obtain authentication token using client credentials
endpoints.response_format: JSON with access token and expiration

endpoints.description: List available datasets and their metadata
Retrieve data for specific dataset with filtering options

content_summary.geographic_scope: Global with focus on publicly traded companies
content_summary.update_frequency: Daily updates with real-time web scraping

research_notes.api_summary: Thinknum provides alternative data through web scraping intelligence with comprehensive tracking of company metrics and consumer behavior. Features well-documented REST API with authentication, dataset management, and flexible data retrieval options.

name: Eagle Alpha Data Marketplace
description: Alternative data marketplace platform providing access to 1,850+ dataset profiles from various vendors. Functions as data discovery and vendor connection service rather than direct API provider.

access_info.pricing_model: Marketplace model - pricing varies by individual data vendor

endpoints.description: Browse available datasets and vendor profiles
endpoints.response_format: Web platform interface with dataset listings

content_summary.geographic_scope: Global dataset coverage through various vendors
content_summary.update_frequency: Platform updated continuously with new vendor additions

research_notes.api_summary: Eagle Alpha operates as a marketplace aggregator connecting clients with alternative data vendors rather than providing direct APIs. The platform helps discover and evaluate alternative data sources from 1,850+ dataset profiles.

name: Nasdaq Data Link API (formerly Quandl)
description: Comprehensive financial and economic data platform providing access to millions of datasets through REST API and streaming services. Offers both free public datasets and premium alternative data sources.

access_info.pricing_model: Freemium - free datasets available, premium subscriptions for alternative data

endpoints.description: Retrieve specific dataset with time series data
endpoints.response_format: JSON/CSV with time series data and metadata

endpoints.description: List available databases and their metadata
endpoints.response_format: JSON with database listings and descriptions

content_summary.geographic_scope: Global coverage with extensive US focus
content_summary.update_frequency: Varies by dataset - real-time to quarterly updates

research_notes.api_summary: Nasdaq Data Link (formerly Quandl) provides comprehensive access to millions of financial and economic datasets through well-documented REST API. Offers freemium model with both free public data and premium alternative data sources.

name: 7Park Data Consumer Analytics API
description: Consumer behavior analytics platform providing transaction data, app engagement metrics, and web activity insights for investment research and business intelligence. Enterprise-only access with custom APIs.

access_info.pricing_model: Enterprise-only with custom pricing based on data requirements

endpoints.description: Web activity and traffic analytics for companies and sectors
endpoints.response_format: JSON with web activity metrics and trends

endpoints.description: Consumer transaction data and spending patterns
endpoints.response_format: JSON with transaction volumes and consumer behavior

endpoints.description: Mobile app usage and engagement analytics
endpoints.response_format: JSON with app usage statistics and engagement metrics

content_summary.geographic_scope: United States with selective international coverage
content_summary.update_frequency: Daily updates with some real-time components

research_notes.api_summary: 7Park Data specializes in consumer behavior analytics with enterprise-only access. Provides transaction data, app engagement metrics, and web activity insights for investment research. API documentation endpoints were inaccessible during research.

name: Alpha Hat Investment Research API (Discontinued)
description: Former investment research automation platform that accelerated analysis workflows. Acquired by Earnest Research in January 2020 and technology integrated into parent company's platform.

access_info.pricing_model: Service discontinued - technology integrated into Earnest Research

endpoints.description: Historical endpoint for investment research automation

content_summary.geographic_scope: Historical service scope no longer available

research_notes.api_summary: Alpha Hat was acquired by Earnest Research in January 2020. The investment research automation technology has been integrated into Earnest Research's platform and is no longer available as a standalone API service.
